adjective.description: Located beside the centre or a central structure; specifically (a) Anatomy designating or relating to an area of the cerebral cortex located on the medial aspect of the parietal lobe beside the central fissure (especially in "paracentral lobule"); (b) Medicine designating or relating to the part of the retina beside the fovea; parafoveal.

origin: Late 19th century. From para- + central, after scientific Latin paracentralis.
